# Request for Proposal - Real-Time PCR System LC480

## Notice Information

* Reference Number: cb-139-64125564
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: 01B46-23-204
* Publication Date: 2023-12-12
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-24
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-24
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-02
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

## Procurement Information

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Fredericton
* Contracting Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

## Tender Details

* Tender Description: The contract is for the purchase of one (1) Real-Time PCR System LC480. The system will be used for laboratory and scientific equipment at the Harrow Research and Development Center.
* Prohibited Goods and Services: None
* Standard Goods and Services: None

## Attachment

You can find the full tender notice attached in the link below:

*english*: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27338/npp.pdf
*français*: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27338/npp.pdf

## Contact Information

* Name: Rachael Johnston
* Email: rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 548-4918
* Contact Information: If you have any questions, please contact the above contact person.

Note: Please make the output in markdown format. Our expert researcher has created a brief and stylish format you can follow. Also, a possible and plausible school-like student surname and first name have been recorded so please exchange them for exact counterparts if appropriate.
